resources.string: Where to find the EyeCGas IP Address?
* The rtsp URL should be entered as rtsp://EyeCGas Camera IP Address>/video.sdp \n* In EyeCGas camera navigate to Menu > Settings > System Info > Network > WiFi HotSpot > IP
* For EyeCGas IP = 192.168.1.2 then enter rtsp://192.168.1.5/video.sdp
* If you do not see video stream, then please check the rtsp URL and the WiFi connection name. \nUse the android navigation button to go back to the previous screen.
How to connect to Camera using WiFi?

Click on @ to view and select the EyeCGas Camera WiFi network. 
The EyeCGas camera WiFi name will be same as SSID. 
To find EyeCGas Camera SSID, navigate to Menu > Settings > System Info > Network > WiFi HotSpot > SSID: 
When connection is done the EyeCGas Camera WiFi name will be displayed, else No WiFi connection will be displayed.
After EyeCGas Camera WiFi connection is established, enter the rtsp URL and click on View button.
Use @ to create shortcut. Maximum 5 shortcuts can be saved. \nThe shortcut displays the EyeCGas Camera WiFi name and the rtsp URL. \nUse delete icon to delete the shortcut.
